description: '''Stephanie Victoria Allen''' (born 14 December 1991), known professionally as '''Stefflon Don''', is an English rapper. She rose to fame with her 2017 single "[[Hurtin' Me]]" (featuring [[French Montana]]), which peaked at number seven on the [[UK singles chart|UK Singles Chart]]. In 2016, Allen released her debut mixtape ''Real Ting'', followed by her second, ''[[Secure (mixtape)|Secure]]'' (2018).
